description:
The Hoshi no Kirby animated series is based on the Kirby video games released by Nintendo in the 1990s, and is Kirby`s very first anime.
Kirby is a warrior who crash lands on planet Popstar, and ends up protecting its people from King Dedede.
Note: The US dub airing order differs from the original Japanese airing order. The US airing order is: 1-11, 15, 12, 14, 16, 18-30, 13, 31, 35-36, 34, 33, 37, 39-44, 47-48, 38, 52-53, 49-51, 96-97, 45-46, 54-93, 17, 32, 94-95, 98-100.
